description.value:
Frequency once per day

Your talents in shapechanging allow you to pass unseen. When you Change Shape into your humanoid form, you gain the effects of 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise] for 1 hour or until you shift back, except it's a polymorph effect rather than an illusion.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
